titleStmt.title: The second letter from John Lilburn Esquire, prisoner in Newgate to the Right Honourable John Fowke, Lord Major of the city of London.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Newgate this 10th of July, 1653.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
